english.segment1: I choose to trust You. Even through the fire. Even when my eyes can't see. I know You're right beside me. I will always praise You Lord. No matter what may come. You are always faithful to me
english.segment2: CHORUS. So I will dream. And I'll believe. That what You've promised. Soon I will see. Soon I will see
english.segment3: It's just a matter of time. Till I see Your face. Till I dance in Your presence. And sing out Your praise. It's just a matter of time. Till I hear You say. Well done
english.segment4: I surrender. To Your will. To Your way. To Your plan. All I have. And all I am. All I am
english.segment6: It's just a matter of time. Till I see Your face. Till I dance in Your presence. And sing out Your praise. It's just a matter of time. Till I hear You say. Well done
